arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Milan’s Leao and Nkunku vs Roma’s Soulé and Dybala
arts.sum: Milan vs Roma is a great classic of Italian football, one of the most anticipated matches of the season, full of individual duels. Think of the tactical battle between Massimiliano Allegri and Gian Piero Gasperini, or the head-to-head between goalkeepers Maignan and Svilar, and the contest on the wings between Saelemaekers and Wesley. That’s not […]

arts.ttl: Surprise inclusion: Jashari called up for Milan-Roma?
arts.sum: Tomorrow night, AC Milan will host Roma at San Siro for Matchday 10 of Serie A Enilive. Following the afternoon training session, important updates have emerged regarding the squad list. According to MilanNews, despite his absence being considered almost certain, Fikayo Tomori has pushed through the pain and will be available against Roma. Despite the […]

arts.ttl: Serie A preview: AC Milan vs. Roma – Team news, opposition insight, stats and prediction
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will take on Roma in the 10th round of Serie A on Sunday evening. In front of a sold-out San Siro, the Rossoneri will be looking to leapfrog the Giallorossi. Both teams have started the season better than most expected, with 18 and 21 points respectively, so the game could be a close […] The post Serie A preview: AC Milan vs. Roma – Team news, opposition insight, stats and prediction appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: MN: Jashari and Tomori called up for Milan vs. Roma – only three absences
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Ardon Jashari and Fikayo Tomori have both been called up for AC Milan’s game against Roma tomorrow, as confirmed by a report this evening. Massimiliano Allegri has been forced to deal with many injuries over the last few weeks, travelling with very few substitutes to every game. arts.ttl: Official: Guida to officiate Milan vs. Roma – many precedents and a positive record
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Marco Guida has been named as the referee for AC Milan’s game against Roma on Sunday evening. It certainly won’t be the 44-year-old’s first rodeo. Milan need to bounce back with a win tomorrow, following two consecutive draws, but Roma are expected to make life difficult for the Rossoneri. arts.ttl: Milan vs Roma: defense likely to decide a tight battle at San Siro
arts.sum: With the first midweek round now over, we return to action earlier than usual this season due to Milan’s absence from European competitions. The draw in Bergamo against Ivan Juric’s team already feels distant, because tomorrow night a side sitting at the top of the table (along with Napoli) will arrive at San Siro, riding […]

arts.ttl: Opposition insight for Milan-Roma: Form, injuries, predicted eleven and more
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will be up against Roma on Sunday evening, hoping to leapfrog the Giallorossi in the league standings, but it’s bound to be a difficult task for Massimiliano Allegri’s men. After the disappointing draw against Pisa, Milan wanted to bounce back with a win against Atalanta mid-week but instead, they got another draw. arts.ttl: Vitiello: Big crowd expected at San Siro as Milan aim to leapfrog Roma
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will battle it out against Roma at San Siro tomorrow evening, and according to a report, the game is sold out with over 74k fans expected to attend. October was a month to forget in many ways for Milan. arts.ttl: Pub Chat with Lorenzo and Stefano: Preview of Milan vs. Roma
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Join Lorenzo and Stefano as they preview Sunday’s clash between AC Milan and Roma at San Siro, with the Rossoneri hoping to leapfrog the Giallorossi in the standings. arts.ttl: Gasperini says Roma ‘will try’ to stop Modric and Milan after ‘excellent start’
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Ahead of the important game between AC Milan and Roma at San Siro, the Giallorossi coach Gian Piero Gasperini spoke to the media at his pre-match press conference.
